about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer with 1+ years of experience creating beautiful and functional web applications.
about.journey1: Started my journey in web development 1 years ago, I've been passionate about creating user-friendly and visually appealing web applications. My expertise lies in modern JavaScript frameworks, particularly React and Next.js.
about.journey2: I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive designs. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
about.journey3: My goal is to build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences while maintaining clean and scalable code.
